price: Ila maji yamoto sana na usaha,
footnotes: Lakini watakunywa maji yalio pita ukomo kwa umoto wake, na usaha unao miminika kutokana na ngozi za watu wa Motoni.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
